wikipedia_page.main: Percy Mason (19 November 1873 – 27 November 1952) was an English first-class cricketer active 1896–1901 who played for Nottinghamshire. He was born in East Bridgford; died in Gunthorpe.

response: *Percy Mason (1873–1952), a first-class cricketer with Nottinghamshire County Cricket Club, was born in East Bridgford.
